import React, {useState} from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import {MdEmail} from 'react-icons/md'; import {CgDetailsMore} from 'react-icons/cg'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser/' import "./index.scss" function Contact(){ const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm('gmail', 'template_y3kp91z', Form.current, 'Oa-UQcNhbqZSwxga6') .then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message, please try again') } ) } return(<>

Contact Us

Providing you with the best and easiest access to fulfill all your travel needs. You only need one click and let us handle the rest, worry-free

Muhammad Bilal Javaid
House no.A-411 Gulistan Colony,
Wah Cantt
Pakistan.
bilalj3940@gmail.com
) } export default Contact;
